titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish a demonstration grant program to provide emergency relief to foster youth and improve pre-placement services offered by foster care stabilization agencies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Foster Care Stabilization Act
This bill requires the Administration for Children and Families to award demonstration grants to foster care stabilization agencies to improve services for foster youth awaiting placement and for other emergency assistance.
